result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ga: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.orig: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.html: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ponchtml: Ar dtús ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roiṁ gaċ éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: Only you can do the job.
result.ga: Ní féidir le héinne ach leat féin an jab a dhéanamh
result.orig: Ní féidir le héinne ach leat féin an jab a dhéanamh
result.html: Ní féidir le héinne ach leat féin an jab a dhéanamhOnly you can do the job.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir le héinne aċ leat féin an jab a ḋéanaṁOnly you can do the job.

result.html: Ní raibh éinne annThere was nobody there.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ éinne annThere was nobody there.

result.ga: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.orig: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.html: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?
result.ponchtml: Tá aiṫne agat ar gaċ éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?

result.ga: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinne
result.orig: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinne
result.html: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.
result.ponchtml: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gaċ éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
